itemDescription: British Army officer and Irish peer (1951-2007)

wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-Colonel Guy Patrick Gilbert Crofton, 7th Baron Crofton (17 June 1951 – 25 November 2007)[1] was an Irish Peer and British Army officer. He was commissioned into the 9th/12th Royal Lancers and served as a Lieutenant-Colonel and Defence Attaché to the British Embassy in Angola.

link_mentions.page: Guy Patrick Gilbert Crofton, 7th Baron Crofton

response: * Guy Crofton, 7th Baron Crofton (1951–2007), Anglo-Irish officer in the British Army
